forums] :Broadcom BCM943602BAED (14e4:43ba, 14e4:aa52) ==Notes== ===Specifications=== *Broadcom BCM943602BAED 802.11abgn/ac + BT 4.1, 3x3, 2.4/5 GHz (Key A+E) :Based on ''[[BCM]]'''s naming scheme, this device is assumed to be using BCM43602. :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom'' News Release for BCM43602] :[[Broadcom]] BCM43602 - Vendor ID: 0x14e4, DeviceID: 0x43ba :*BCM43602 14e4:43ba supported in 3.17+ ([http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac]) :*BCM43602 14e4:43bb 2.4GHz device, supported in 3.19+ :*BCM43602 14e4:43bc 5GHz device, supported in 3.19+ :[[Broadcom]] BCM20703A1 (chipset support BT 4.1 LE) ===Windows driver=== [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/14e4/ Broadcom 802.11ac Wireless PCIE Full Dongle Adapter]
